title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.10 - Waiving the rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.10 - Waiving the rules and regulations

State Regulations

The specific provisions and limitations contained in this

Part may be waived pursuant to provisions of law by the Director of the Budget
whenever he/she determines that strict adherence to the rules would be
detrimental to the sound and orderly administration of State
government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
147.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
